headline: Innovative Technologies Power Caterpillar’s (CAT) Dividend Strength
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is included among the 11 Innovative Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is an American company known for its expertise in construction, mining, and various types of engineering equipment. In the early 1900s, it introduced the first practical track-type tractor, also known as a crawler, which revolutionized the construction and […]

headline: 'Trump's Weak Dollar Dream Will Be A Nightmare' Because His Policies Are 'Highly Inflationary,' Economist Peter Schiff Says
summary: President Donald Trump‘s views about the dollar are getting strong pushback from economists like Europac.com Chief Economist and Global Strategist Peter Schiff. “Trump said he wants a strong dollar but he also wants a weaker dollar. He says a strong dollar makes you feel better, but a weak dollar makes you richer,” Schiff wrote on X last week. He added that although Trump claims he crushed inflation, his policies are highly inflationary, saying, “Trump's weak dollar dream will be a nightmare.” D
